documents.document: Love is beautiful. Love is wonderful. Love is everything. Do you agree? –Ray in "Princess and the Frog"
It's just our luck we're stuck together. Nobody else but you. – Goofy
Look at the world, so close, and I'm halfway to it. Look at it all, so big, do I even dare? –Rapunzel
http://t.co/7k7z45Numi
Sometimes friends are family too. –Snow White in Disney Hallmark
He's so cute http://t.co/OzYNqnz6Ry
It's because I like you, I don't want to be with you. It's a complicated emotion. –Marlin (Finding Nemo)
http://t.co/fQZnHZanqy
Don't be so hard on yourself. Everyone makes mistakes. –Belle in "Belle's Magical World"
Give him something from your heart. It will be more precious than anything you could buy. –Fairy Godmother in "Princess Stories"
Your heart will lead you where you belong. Your heart will lead you home. –Tigger
Follow my friends @ladopeshop badass Fashion & accessories Made in USA, LOS ANGELES CA. have you read your labels? Is it made in the #USA ?
I don’t want that to go that way. I don’t want to forget. –Dory (Finding Nemo)
Life without worry? You seek hakuna matata. –Rafiki (The Lion King 1½)
I’m so hungry. I could eat a whole elephant. –Rolly (101 Dalmatians)
The way you laugh is just the best. –Pooh
An act of true love will thaw a frozen heart. –Olaf (Frozen)
Don't you understand, Tink? You mean more to me than anything in this whole world. –Peter Pan

I choose you, Aladdin. –Jasmine in "Aladdin"
The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible. –Charles in "Alice in Wonderland"
You’ll love me at once, the way you did once upon a dream. –Aurora in "Sleeping Beauty"
I'd get over losing anything, but I'll never get over losing you. –Toy Story 1
Stop taking everything so seriously. –Mother Gothel (Tangled)
A fake reputation is all a man has. –Flynn Rider (Tangled)
Fantasy and reality often overlap. –Walt Disney
Things are not as bad as they seem. –Walt Disney
As you go through life you'll see, there is so much that we don't understand. –Simba (The Lion King II)
You'll be alright. We're together now. Everything's going to be fine. You'll see. –Belle (Beauty and the Beast)

Nothing can go wrong if everything is right, and everything is right somehow. – Pooh
It's a world of laughter, a world of tears. It's a world of hopes, and a world of fears. – It’s A Small World "
"You know how men are. They think that "No" means "Yes" and "Get lost" means "Take me, I'm yours". –Megara in "Hercules"
If I listened earlier, I wouldn't be here. But that's just the trouble with me. –Alice in "Alice in Wonderland"
Don’t be the monster they fear you are. –Hans in "Frozen"
Goodbye? Oh, no, please. Can’t we go back to page one and do it all over again? –Pooh
If you keep on believing, the dreams that you wish will come true. –Cinderella

Friends stick to you like honey. –Pooh
You can't run away from your troubles. There ain't no place that far. –Uncle Remus in "Song of the South"
That’s the real trouble with the world. Too many people grow up. They forget. - Walt Disney
Why is my reflection someone I don't know? –Mulan

Bambi: “I'll never forget any of you.”
